review: Mine works great when it actually works. Drops WiFi signal every 20 minutes. Tried resetting, tried everything. Seems a common issue on the Amazon forums, which Amazon hilariously doesn't monitor. Apparently the antenna in the stick is too weak.  I'll stick with the Google Chromecast.
